description_0: An outdoor downwards angled view of the passenger side hood of a blue automobile. The hood is designed with two aerodynamic bends that distort the reflection of the tall leafless tree visible on the glossy paint stretching towards the driver side. The ground to the left of the automobile is covered with light brown gravel. Another leafless tree is partially visible reflecting off of the passenger side windshield. A tree top covered with leaves is visible in the upper right corner of the hood. The white sunlight and clear sky is visible behind the tree in the reflection in the upper left corner of the hood, which gradually fades to blue towards the bottom of the hood.
description_1: An outdoor daytime close-up view of the top of a blue car with a dark tinted sunroof. A reflection of several trees with thin tree branches and gray cloudy sky can be seen on the sunroof and blue cars surface. Towards the left side of the sun roof, a reflection of a gray wooden home with two windows can be seen. Behind the cars roof is a ground floor made up of multi-shaded dark gray bricks that are positioned horizontally and vertically, and placed side by side. To the left of the brick ground floor is another ground floor made up of small multi-colored rocks, the surface has four small plants rooted into it. And to the left of the small rock surface is a light brown wooden fence made up of wooden boards that are horizontally positioned and stacked on top of each other.
